trans-unit.source: Creates a logical font that has specific characteristics

seg-source.mrk: Creates a logical font that has specific characteristics

target.mrk: Creates a logical font that has specific characteristics

trans-unit.source: $tagLOGFONT structure that defines the characteristics of the logical font

seg-source.mrk: $tagLOGFONT structure that defines the characteristics of the logical font

target.mrk: $tagLOGFONT structure that defines the characteristics of the logical font

trans-unit.source: This function creates a logical font with the characteristics specified in the $tagLOGFONT structure.

seg-source.mrk: This function creates a logical font with the characteristics specified in the $tagLOGFONT structure.

target.mrk: This function creates a logical font with the characteristics specified in the $tagLOGFONT structure.

trans-unit.source: When this font is selected by using the SelectObject function, GDI's font mapper attempts to match the logical font with an existing physical font.

seg-source.mrk: When this font is selected by using the SelectObject function, GDI's font mapper attempts to match the logical font with an existing physical font.

target.mrk: When this font is selected by using the SelectObject function, GDI's font mapper attempts to match the logical font with an existing physical font.

trans-unit.source: If it fails to find an exact match it provides an alternative whose characteristics match as many of the requested characteristics as possible.

seg-source.mrk: If it fails to find an exact match it provides an alternative whose characteristics match as many of the requested characteristics as possible.

target.mrk: If it fails to find an exact match it provides an alternative whose characteristics match as many of the requested characteristics as possible.
